## Description {#details}

ForwardIterator for the bits that are set.

Iterators get invalidated when resize / reserve is called.

Definition at line 34 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/bitvector-h">BitVector.h</a>.
